TextLibrary.Text: ACHERON SPIRIT
Whoa... where am I?
Whoa... where am I?
Your mind is on Acheron Prime.
Your mind is on Acheron Prime.
My mind?
My mind?
Your body remains unharmed on your ship. Why are you here?
Your body remains unharmed on your ship. Why are you here?
I... I was seeking information. Was it you who just attacked us?
I... I was seeking information. Was it you who just attacked us?
The ship you fought was merely a manifestation of my thoughts. You are different to the ones who attacked me before... younger... less perfect... less driven...
The ship you fought was merely a manifestation of my thoughts. You are different to the ones who attacked me before... younger... less perfect... less driven...
We call them the Soulless. They're attacking my people.
We call them the Soulless. They're attacking my people.
All things have a beginning and an end. It is the way of things.
All things have a beginning and an end. It is the way of things.
In time, these creatures will threaten even you. They will never stop. Never.
In time, these creatures will threaten even you. They will never stop. Never.
They could not harm me.
They could not harm me.
You said it yourself. All things have an end. Even you. The Soulless may be the end of us all.
You said it yourself. All things have an end. Even you. The Soulless may be the end of us all.
I will think on your words... return later.
I will think on your words... return later.
